comment: Incredibly pleased to report that there's someone doing an angry tweet thread about my agency's submissions guidelines , and that this thread concludes with " America and the West are in serious trouble . " Have a great Wednesday everyone
amr:
# ::snt Incredibly pleased to report that there's someone doing an angry tweet thread about my agency's submissions guidelines , and that this thread concludes with " America and the West are in serious trouble . " Have a great Wednesday everyone
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / please-01

                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (d / do-02
                              :ARG0 (s / someone)
                              :ARG1 (t / thread
                                    :ARG1-of (a2 / anger-01)
                                    :mod (t2 / tweet-01)
                                    :topic (g / guideline
                                          :topic (s2 / submit-01)
                                          :poss (a3 / agency
                                                :poss ii))))
                        :op2 (c / conclude-01
                              :ARG1 (t3 / thread
                                    :mod (t4 / this))
                              :ARG2 (ii2 / in-trouble-03
                                    :ARG1 (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (c2 / country
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "America"))
                                          :op2 (w / world-region
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "West")))
                                    :ARG1-of (s3 / serious-02)))))
            :ARG1 ii
            :degree (ii3 / incredible))

            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (e / everyone)
            :ARG1 (d2 / date-entity
                  :weekday (w2 / wednesday)
                  :mod (g2 / great))))
